note: Designations can be overlapping; a drug can receive multiple designations or no designation at all. CDER is part of the [US Food and Drug Administration (FDA)](#dod:us-fda).
title: New drugs approved in the United States, by designations
subtitle: The annual number of new drugs approved by the Center for Drug Evaluation and Research (CDER), that fall under each designation, including [Orphan Drugs](#dod:orphan-drug), [Fast Track](#dod:fda-fast-track), [Accelerated Approval](#dod:fda-accelerated-approval), [Breakthrough Therapy](#dod:breakthrough-therapy), and [Qualified Infectious Disease Product](#dod:qualified-infectious-disease-product).
internalNotes: This does NOT include biologics such as vaccines or gene therapies which are approved by the Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research (CBER).
